website_summaries.verdict: The Q Acoustics Media 4’s minimalist features set, built-in subwoofer, and fuss-free sound make for an attractive alternative to bulkier sound bar systems.
pros: The Q Acoustics Media 4 sound bar offers sophisticated home theater sound in a single speaker, without a subwoofer
It's easy to set up and use, and sounds decent with both movies and music
It's more dynamic sounding than our favorite one-box sound bar, the Zvox SB500
cons: It can't match the dynamics of sound bars with dedicated subs
The Zvox has better bass and more natural dialogue

customer_reviews.title: Clumsy and annoying
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound, unpleasant interface. Turns itself off after short period of inactivity. Doesn't automatically turn itself back on when you begin playing sound through it. Can't use Bluetooth without getting up to turn it on. You'll always have to disconnect Bluetooth devices every time it turns on if your goal is to listen to non Bluetooth sources. Apparently, you can't replace the flimsy remote. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: empirep

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for music and movies.
customer_reviews.text: Just stop looking and buy it already. Especially for music. It definitely sounds great with movies and TV, but if your looking for simulated surrounded sound, this is not for you. But as a standard stereo sound bar, this thing is outstanding. Note that I personally have a separate Sony sub woofer attached, and it really is needed for a solid bass thump. But the internal sub woofer is good, too.
customer_reviews.author: WHISKEY PIGGY

customer_reviews.title: Non impressive sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking soundbar, from the description it seemed like it would have near audiophile sound, nowhere close. As for TV, it works ok for a half hour or so and then it will go into sleep mode, mind you without pausing the show, on its own. Had to pause, remove power and restart, which worked about half the time. I was really hoping this would be a decent item for the price point, but alas, it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Warners

customer_reviews.title: A-It's easy to hook up and is a no nonsense speaker ...
customer_reviews.text: There are two parts here. A-It's easy to hook up and is a no nonsense speaker that increases the quality over the standard speakers in most TV's by a factor of at least ten. No it's no high end unit but it's well worth the asking price. B-I have a word for an outfit that pinches pennies and includes a wall mount with NO HARDWARE. So a ten mile drive to Lowes and a sales guy running back and forth to match up screws and anchors to install. The pox on this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Ehrlich

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.  Good value.  We are happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Great improvement over the tv speakers. It sounds very good for both movies and music. Voices are clear. It could use a little more bass for some movies and for some music, but on balance, we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ainsworth

customer_reviews.title: many little issues make it not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Has several small issues that just make it not worth it. No low-volume precision makes it hard to listen quietly. Overly boosted bass leaves speech hard to hear. Bluetooth did not reliably connect with Samsung QLED tv. Soundbar powers-off in like 10 minutes, which turns the TV speakers on (if it was connected via BLE). Also, one time, the volume went to full on its own and was making static sounds. Overall, I wanted to like this sound bar, but too many small issues, so it had to go back.
customer_reviews.author: The Khan

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing, buy used Bose instead for 100x the quality
customer_reviews.text: We thought this would be an amazing value for the money after reading the reviews. We have a 15 year old bose system. We could not have been more wrong. The lack of sound depth creates tinny sound on both tv and music. We were so incredibly disappointed. Your money is better spent on a used bose system from ebay for the same money.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Check TV Specs Carefully for Capability to Integrate
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this soundbar EXCEPT that I must use the soundbar control separately from the TV or cable control to adjust the volume. Had I known this, I might have chosen a soundbar from the same label as my TV to get seamless integration.
customer_reviews.author: MadMan2

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value
customer_reviews.text: I'm convinced there are other systems that sound better. But for the money this is the best I've heard. In fairness I do also have an external sub connected and it makes a huge difference. But the design, connections and sound quality - all great.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse J. Larvick

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: We returned this sound bar due to the fact that I wear hearing aids that come with a TV connector and the connector & sound bar doesn't work well together. Helped my husband,, but his hearing is ok. Checked off "stars" refer to my husband's hearing, not mine.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound!
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Excellent sound quality, love it Crystal clear dialogue Not fussy and quality build Compact design- no external sub needed, but if you are a bass head, the connection is there Ease of use and easy setup I like the little lightweight remote Great price for the sound quality you get Cons: The Q remote automatically turns my integrated amplifier on/off and I'd rather it didn't Some preset volume setting increases are just a hair too much No HDMI connection--but it sounds so fantastic I could care less
customer_reviews.author: greta

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it, definitely did not.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this soundbar. It did not perform as well as I had hoped, but it was satisfactory at normal volumes. Any higher than average volumes had a sort of tin can effect, which I figured was just the connection type I was using. I am giving a 1 star review because seemingly the entire bar was blown within a few months of setting it up, and I never even used it at a high volume. Overall, very disappointed, and I wish I had chosen a product with a better warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Kmac

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you’re after in a 2 channel sound bar.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sound bar. The only two things you could ding it on I knew before I bought it, so they were non-issues. The remote is cheap, big time. And there is no hdmi input, just an optical and basic left/right audio. They didn’t try to create special effects or anything crazy. Just good sound in a solid package. I like the 4 vs the 3 because of the sub out, which I’m using. If you’re looking, give it a spin. 30 day guarantee 😄

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds amazing. A little tall, so it may block your ir on your tv. But it's worth it.

customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good. It did need a week or so to break in. I read other reviews stating the bass was fine but I added my Polk 10" sub and turned it down a little and now it is perfect. Alexa connects to it perfectly and streams music. customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing! I also love that I can connect it to my phone via Bluetooth, and that I can play my iPod through it! So far, we are very pleased with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Truly great soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic. As this product and company gain more traction in the United States, I hope that people quickly realize the superb audio quality this soundbar has to offer. While not perfect, this soundbar excellently handles lows, mids, and highs for both music and movies. You will be hard pressed to find anything better at this price point. Possible considerations you will want to factor in are the size and depth of this product for your TV setup as placement can potentially be awkward. product_meta.title: Q Acoustics Media 4 Soundbar with Built In Subwoofer - Black
product_meta.description:
Using twin 65mm BMR (Balanced Mode Radiator) drive units, the Media 4 gives pinpoint accuracy and is bursting with detail right up to high volume levels. BMR technology combines the advantages of both flat panel and conventional speakers. This means that, unlike some soundbars, the M4 is truly dynamic and won't turn harsh or brittle when the music or film action gets intense. Another key advantage of BMR speakers is the superb spatial imaging they offer. Compared with conventional drive units, they provide a broad and spacious sound that comes right out 'into' the room. Rather than using a separate subwoofer, Q Acoustics have elected to build the subwoofer into the main casing. This obviously makes for a neater overall package and less wiring. Using a dedicated 150mm x 120mm drive unit, plus its own 50 watt amplifier, the M4 has little trouble in reproducing deep, powerful movie soundtracks. Using NFC or Bluetooth technology, you can connect up just about any smartphone, tablet or newer laptop, Mac or PC and stream your music. With compatible NFC devices, simply hold the unit next to the top of the soundbar and you're good to stream. With Bluetooth you pair your device with the soundbar. Once done, you'll be able to stream music from your stored library or from streaming music services such as Spotify or Last.fm. Coming with both detachable feet and a wall bracket, you can choose how to place your M4 soundbar. Once positioned, connection is easy, too. Choose between an optical digital lead (ideal for most TVs), or RCA phono or 3.5mm analogue inputs.



BOX CONTAINS
1 x Q Acoustics Media 4
1 x Lithium Battery (3V, CR2025)
1 x Remote Control
1 x UK AC Mains Cable
1 x EU AC Mains Cable
1 x RCA Phono Lead (2 metres)
1 x 3.5mm Jack Lead (2 metres)
1 x Optical Lead (2 metres)
1 x Wall Mounting Plate
3 x Anti-vibration Feet with 6 x Screws
1 x User Manual
feature_bullets: Soundbar with Built-In Subwoofer - Eliminating the need for extra boxes and cables. when wall-mounted, using the included wall bracket, the distinctive flared shape of the M4 allows sufficient clearance behind the unit for the cable entry

The Media 4 Soundbar uses BMR loudspeaker drive units. This means, wherever you sit in your room, you'll still enjoy the full hi-fi or home cinema experience, Frequency response- +/-0.5dB 20Hz to 20kHz
The digital optical and analogue inputs allows you to connect to a wide range sources from your television, CD, DVD or Blu-ray player, all the way through to your smartphone.
The Media 4 is also Bluetooth compatible using aptX lossless Bluetooth for audio streaming. This wireless connection can sync to almost any Bluetooth compatible audio device.

Box Contents - 1 x Q M4 Hi-Fi Soundbar, 1 x Lithium Battery, 1 x Remote Control, 1 x UK AC Mains Cable, 1 x EU AC Mains Cable, 1 x RCA Phono Lead (2 metres), 1 x 3.5mm Jack Lead (2 metres), 1 x Optical Lead (2 metres), 1 x Wall Mounting Plate, 3 x Anti-vibration Feet with 6 x Screws and 1 x User Manual
